content.text:
# Battle of Kufit

| combatant2        =  Mahdist Sudan
| commander1        = Ras Alula
| commander2        = Osman Digna
| strength1         = 10,000–25,000 men
| strength2         = 6,000–12,000 men
| casualties1       = 1,500 killed
| casualties2       = 3,000–5,050 killed
| campaignbox       =
}}
The Battle of Kufit was a military engagement fought on 22–23 September 1885, between the Mahdist Sudanese and Ethiopian forces. This fighting resulted in a crushing defeat for the Mahdists and a victory for the Ethiopians led by Ras Alula.
